text: In this Chinese dialogue, a father and son make plans to go to Beijing (北京).Domestic flights are very cheap in China, and a lot more convenient than taking a train for 10+ hours.儿子：爸爸，我想去北京。爸爸：为什么呢？儿子：因为北京很好玩儿，我爱北京。爸爸：那我们现在就坐出租车去机场吧！儿子：爸爸真好！谢谢爸爸！爸爸：不客气。Son：Dad, I want to go to Beijing.Dad：Why?Son：Because Biejing is fun, I love Beijing.Dad：Then lets go take a taxi to the airport!Son：You’re awesome, dad! Thanks dad!Dad：Don’t mention it.1 – 为什么儿子想去北京？a. 因为北京很美b. 因为北京有很多人c. 因为北京很好玩儿d. 他不想去北京2 – 他们怎么去机场？a. 坐出租车b.坐公共汽车c. 走路d. 坐火车1. c2. aReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
